Reviews.Title: “An unfortunate experience”
Reviews.Author: Luis074
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel participating conference barcelona personnel friendly hotel located paseig de garcia diagonal metro station hotel renovated day door lock didnt trials porter spend night door unlocked maintenance intervention day found locked inside intervention porters change bathroom basin broken door bathroom smell expect star hotel barcelona standards stated renovated

Reviews.Title: “Pleased with our stay here!”
Reviews.Author: Kaiolohiakids
Reviews.Content: hotel booked thru conference attended little leary reading reviews thinking stay quiet despite busy street close metro easy walking distance gaudi houses shops restaurants metro corner served breakfast morning staff polite helpful bath roomy comfortable qualms staying yes little outdated beds little hard didnt feel detrimental stay

Reviews.Title: “Shabby hotel - not a four star”
Reviews.Author: MaggisO
Reviews.Content: hotel lobby looks elegant modern sterile type didn´t ac mini bars function bathrooms fresh floors marked noticed looked blood stain bath tub didn´t look close elevator top floor hotel situated close central metro station wich opportunity hotel ordinary breakfast

Reviews.Title: “very dissapointing choice”
Reviews.Author: maria-teogreece
Reviews.Content: people rude tough facing stay breakfast terrible basement natural light ok appropriate 4 star hotel noise characteristic smell location convinient

Reviews.Title: “Enjoy the rumble of the underground trains”
Reviews.Author: sir_travelsalot013
Reviews.Content: reception rude adequate overall dated mattress hard worst vibration noise underground trains passing directly beneath hotel 1015 minutes morning late night water pressure shower windows nifty electric blinds internet adequate

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was a real disappointment.”
Reviews.Author: FloppoFlentini
Reviews.Content: booked hotel birthday trip fatherinlaw party eight included elderly parents children hotel looked promising website actually shabby barcelona lots times love eixample district hotel grotty street opposite cash converters hotel badly updating sliding doors wardrobe propped wall 3 days door kicked hanging hinges door toilet downstairs staff surly disinterested ages served bar barman appeared doing various jobs positive hotel tube station adjacent centre barcelona quickly hotel staying

Reviews.Title: “Dump”
Reviews.Author: johnlh
Reviews.Content: dont pay stay lufthansa airlines hotel air traffic controllers strike shame bad dirty windows shiny elevator dont europe windows clean hallway looked trouble getting 614 attempts key card beds hard mold ceiling smoke detector bath tub enamel chipped rusty corner bathrooms built dirt avoid hotel cost free internet

Reviews.Title: “Okay place”
Reviews.Author: JabberwockyIndia
Reviews.Content: breakfast comfortable clean quiet road watch balcony hotel overlook drab houses unfortunately comfortable hotel located bit attractions restaurants hence recommend tourists tourist stay hotel closer la rambla ok business travellers

Reviews.Title: “They know and perform their business well”
Reviews.Author: CairoSam
Reviews.Content: service experienced hotel expected moment arrived welcome smile ready helped life lot tour leader allocated guest size clean comfort hotel location underground station aroung corner hotel walk shopping easy mention shops hotel food offered hotel testy recommendation time coffee tea electric kettle recommend hotel wil visit barcelona stay liked
